home.title: DMZ Sleep Test
home.subtitle: Start the test to get a personal report.

cards.start_desc: Answer in 5–10 min, get an actionable report.
cards.articles_desc: Learn more about sleep and habits.

pattern.too_short: I sleep less than I need most nights.
pattern.irregular_times: My bed/wake times vary a lot from day to day.
pattern.late_long_naps: I take long or late naps that disrupt my night sleep.

insomnia.long_sleep_onset: It takes a long time to fall asleep after going to bed.
insomnia.frequent_awakenings: I wake up several times during the night.
insomnia.early_morning_awakenings: I wake up too early and can’t fall back asleep.
insomnia.unrefreshed_mornings: I don’t feel refreshed when I get up.
insomnia.daytime_impact: My sleep problems affect me during the day (mood, focus, energy).

quality.overall_poor: My overall experience of sleep is poor.
quality.dissatisfied: I am dissatisfied with my sleep.
quality.restless_nights: My sleep is often restless (nightmares, restlessness, pain).

daytime.doze_easily: I nod off easily in quiet situations (TV, reading, passenger in a car).
daytime.struggle_stay_awake: I struggle to stay awake when I need to focus.
daytime.tired_most_day: I fight tiredness for large parts of the day.

hygiene.screens_before_bed: I use phone/computer screens right before bedtime.
hygiene.late_caffeine: I drink coffee/energy drinks late in the day.
hygiene.alcohol_near_bed: I drink alcohol close to bedtime.
hygiene.big_meal_late: I eat large meals late in the evening.
hygiene.hard_exercise_late: I exercise hard right before bedtime.

env.too_light_noise_temp: The bedroom is often too bright, noisy, or the wrong temperature.
env.uncomfortable_bed: The bed or pillow is uncomfortable.
env.bad_associations: I work/watch TV in bed and get poor sleep associations.

breathing.observed_apneas: Others have observed breathing pauses when I sleep.
breathing.daytime_tired_despite: I’m very sleepy during the day even after a “normal” night.

f.sleep_hours: Hours of sleep per night (last week avg)

flags.osa_signal: Possible signs of sleep apnea — consider talking to your GP.
flags.excessive_sleepiness: Pronounced daytime sleepiness — be extra cautious.

pattern.short_naps: Avoid late/long naps; keep them short before 3 pm.
pattern.protect_7h: Aim for at least 7h sleep nightly.

insomnia.rule_20min: If not asleep in ~20 min: get up, do something calm.
insomnia.stimulus_control: Bed only for sleep/sex, not TV/phone/work.

quality.consult_if_pain: Consult a clinician for persistent pain.

hygiene.screens_off_60: No screens in the last 60 min.

breathing.consider_gp_check: Consider a GP check if persistent.
